job.title: Youth Development Specialist

DirectorppstrongSalarystrong 16hr  DOE ppnbspnbspppstrongAbout the MidPeninsula Boys amp Girls Club MPBGCstrongnbspppThe MidPeninsula Boys amp Girls Club is a nonprofit organization that has served youth between the ages of 5 and 19 years since 1955 We are part of a national movement that began in 1860 and now serves over 48 million youth in over 4000 Boys amp Girls Clubs across the country As part of our mission we provide our members with a wide array of educational recreational and social activities in a safe and structured environment during afterschool hoursnbspnbspppWe believe our success is achieved through our talented and motivated staff members Our staff is a diverse group of people some are in college some are coaches while others have family with children of their own Whether a staff member is fulltime parttime or seasonal everyone plays a key role in our youths growth and achievements in all facets of life Not to mention all the lifetime memories with our
